990010.name: Project Blueless
990010.description:
Project Blueless is a fast multiplayer 2D shooter with quick matches that allow for bullet dodging moves and very competitive games. Join 1-minute matches of up to 10 players equipped with different weapons, grenades, and skins.

Developed initially as a tech sample, Blueless is a sample implementation that showcases Photon Quantum, a new networking technology developed by Exit Games.

This is a demo that showcases the new technology in form of a game freely available to everyone. Blueless started as a sample that we iterated over time, until it became something we cherish and wish share with other people. There are a bunch of other features we'd like to add and one day make this a full fledged game. We'd love to hear your thoughts on it!

Game on and have fun.
990010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
